name: Orb of Light
description: You create a small orb of light.
The orb gives off the listed intensities of light. As an Active Action, you can move the orb; the orb has its own Movement Distance.

name: Calm Emotions
description: You calm the emotional state of creatures.
All entities in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a Defensive Roll against your Offensive Roll. On a hit, a target must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.

A target that fails the Resistance Check suppress the any negative emotional state, such as [@state Anger @] and [@state Rage @]. The exception to this is the [@state Fear @] state, which is reduced by one degree. This does not stop actions done in cold blood.
The effects of this spell last until the End Phase. If the target has a negative emotional state by a power, the state returns. Natural emotions can return if the target so chooses.

name: Flare
description: You create a blinding flash of light.

All entities in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a SR Check; a target gains a `+4` deed bonus to the Check if they are looking away or have their eyes covered -- closed eyes are not sufficient to count as cover.

A target that fails the Resistance Check gains the Partially Blind state. The state lasts for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Failure. If the target has 10 or more Degrees of Failure, they instead gain the Totally Blind state until they have less than 10 rounds remaining.

name: Light Screen
description: A barrier of light forms to protect you.
You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. This barrier possess the Imbued trait. Attacks using the Darkness Damage Type deal twice as much damage to the barrier.

effect: The barrier is immune to attacks using the Physical Damage Group that do not have the [@trait Imbued @] trait.

name: Perceive
description: Your eyes fill with a powerful light, that enhances all your senses.
You gain a power bonus to Notice and Search Checks. This power bonus also applies to Magic Appraisal Checks make to sense and measure mana.

name: Armor of Light
description: Particles of light solidify into a protective suit of armor.
You gain a natural AV against Force and Light Damage Types and half as much against the Physical and Elemental Damage Groups.

name: Rebuke Darkness
description: The creatures of shadow are harmed by this spell.
All darkness elementals in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a SR Check.
A target that fails the Resistance Check takes 20 points of Force Damage per Degree of Failure. A target with the Rex Damage Role multiplies the damage by their Rex Multiplier.

name: Detect Negative Emotions
description: Using the light, you are able to sense the negative threads of energy around you.

You detect the negative emotions of all entities within an area around you. This sense informs you of the type and intensity of negative emotion but not its location. You can also detect creatures composed of negative emotions, and sense their location.
A target can resist the detection by making a SR Check.

name: Light Beam
description: A beam of intense light flies forth.
You make an Offensive Roll against an entity. On a hit, the target takes Light Damage with the listed Base Damage.

name: Hologram
description: This spell creates the image of an entity.

You create a visual active figment that is no larger than the listed size. The illusion is composed of light; it cannot interact with any entity and it disappears when it is hit by an attack with the Imbued trait.
A creature can determine the nature of the illusion by making an Almost Impossible (24) Notice Check or a Very Difficult (16) [@skill Search @] Check.

effect: 3 cubic feet or about a Medium sized creature
50 cubic feet or about a Large sized creature
150 cubic feet or about a Huge sized creature
300 cubic feet or about a Gargantuan sized creature

name: Chains of Light
description: Chains of light latch onto a creature.
You make an Trap maneuver against an entity. The Opposed Characteristic Check uses the listed Strength.
The chains are material and have the Imbued trait and a Fortitude of 25 but can only be broken by an object with the Imbued trait.

name: Control Light
description: This spell gives you control over the light around you.
You gain the following actions:

description.name: Control Creature of Light
entries: You can gain control over a light elemental. A target must make a SR Check. A target that succeeds is immune to the control from this spell for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Success.
Failure means the target falls under your control. This control is active, meaning you must spend AP to make the target perform actions.

A target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure on the previous Check. If the target ever leaves the area or the spell ends, your control ends.

description.name: Modify Light
entries: You can change the shape, color, and intensity of a source of light. You cannot increase the intensity to more than twice its original value.

description.name: Redirect Light
entries: You can take this reaction when an attack using Light Damage passes through the area suffers `D2` on the Offensive Roll.

name: Detect Life
description: The light allows you to sense the life around you.
You detect the life of creatures within an area around you. This sense informs you of the location of creatures but not their strength.
A target can resist the detection by making a SR Check.

name: Spy of Light
description: An eye of light appears before you.

You must actively control the spy. The spy is material but only visible on the material plane. It is immune to damage that does not have the Imbued trait. The spy also have a Flight Value of 14; if it even flies farther than the listed distance it disappears. You gain the following actions:

description.name: See Through Spy
entries: This intention allows you to project your sight through the spy. The spy has the listed Final Skill Value for the Notice and Search Skills.

description: While you can see the spy or are seeing through it, you can use your Spell Projection to perform Defensive Rolls for the spy.

name: Imbue with Positive Feeling
description: This spell imbues creatures with a feeling of ecstasy.
All entities in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a Defensive Roll against your Offensive Roll. On a hit, a target must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.
A target that fails the Resistance Check feels an overwhelmingly pleasurable sensation, causing a `-2` all-action penatly and they ignore the Pain state caused by exhaustion and Criticals.

name: Banish Negative Emotions
description: All creatures within the listed area are targeted, including you. A target must succeed a SR or MR Check or suppress all negative emotions.

An affected target suppress the [@state Anger @] and [@state Rage @] state and reduces the [@state Fear @] state by one degree. This does not stop actions done in cold blood. This effect ends on the End Phase after a number of minutes have passed equal to their Degree of Failure. The target can make a new Resistance Check to end the effect early whenever they take damage, this cannot increase the original duration.

name: Healing Light
description: Choose a single creature to target. The target regains the listed number of Life Points. This spell does not restore lost or destroyed limbs, nor is it capable of removing the Pain state.

name: Seeking Sphere
description: You unleash a sphere of light, which you can control using your [@skill Spell Projection @]. If the target dodges, the spell can continue attacking the following round, on your turn, since it has not been destroyed. When the spell hits or is blocked, the sphere vanishes. If you stop maintaining the spell, the sphere will act on its own with an [@skill Initiative @] Roll of 0 and will follow the last target. An abandoned sphere that makes an attack has the listed Final Offensive Roll.

name: Zone of Detection
description: You create a stationary zone that lets you detect all creatures within it. You can choose the shape of the zone, but it must remain contiguous and has no internal gaps. The spell informs you the exact location of each creature in the zone. You also learn when another detection spell -- but not detection powers -- attempts to scan the an area within the zone.

A target must succeed a SR Check to resist detection. A caster of the Detection spell can resist by making the same SR Check. A target must repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Success. Once a target has been detected, they are known until it leaves the zone.

name: Enter Another's Dream
description: You can physically enter the dream of a targeted sleeping creature. You have no control over the dream world and anything that happens there will be real for you. The target must have a peaceful dream to be affected by this spell and the moment the dream becomes a nightmare, you stop maintaining the spell, the ze wake up, or ze dies, you are returned to reality right next to the zir. Any Effect spell cast on the target will also affect you. The target must succeed a [@skill SR @] or [@skill MR @] Check to prevent you entering their dream. A target that passes the Resistance Check cannot be the target of your spell until they fall asleep again.

Once you are in the zir dream, you can jump to the dream of another creature within range of the target. The new target can make a [@skill SR @] or [@skill MR @] Check, passing means that you cannot jump to zir dream.
If the target's dream is within the Veil, you are trapped there.

name: Light Form
description: Choose a single creature and all their possessions, to target. The target is transformed into pure light and gains the Immaterial and Imbued traits. They can choose to interact with material objects. The target also gains a power bonus to Resistance Checks against light-based powers. Lastly, the target doubles the Final Damage from any attack using the Darkness Damage Type.

effect: As intermediate degree but the Resistance Check bonus applies to all Resistance Checks not against darkness
As advanced degree but the target does not take additional damage from Darkness Damage

name: Blessing
description: You create an aura of beneficial energies. All creatures of your choice within a radius around you gain Advantage on their Skill Checks and Resistance Checks. Once a creature leaves the area, they no longer benefit from the Advantage. A creature cannot benefit from more than one Blessing spell at one time.

name: Create Positive Feeling
description: Choose a single creature to target and a positive feeling you want to create. The target must succeed a SR or MR Check or will gain that feeling.
The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a day has passed.

name: See Truth
description: Choose a single creature to target. The target gains the ability to see beyond the material plane. This enhanced vision gains a power bonus to the Resistance Check of a phantasmal illusion.

effect: The target can see mana, phenom, and spirits
As Base, but the target can see invisible beings

name: Shield from Negative Emotions
description: You create a stationary zone that prevents dark creatures from entering. A darkness elemental or a creature composed of negative emotions that enter the zone must succeed a SR Check or take 10 Force Damage per Degree of Failure and gain the Pain (4) state. The Pain state lasts until they leave the zone. A target only makes the Resistance Check the first time they enter the zone each round or at the start of the Action Phase if they start in it.

name: Find
description: Choose a single person, place, or thing. You learn its exact location at the moment you cast the spell, reguardless of the distance. The target can be selected with a vague description or set of conditions.
The target must succeed a SR Check to prevent the detection. The spell will then try to find the next closest entity that matches the target or it will fail if it finds no other suitable match.

name: Restore
description: Choose a single creature to target. The target removes a number of degrees of [@state Pain @] that have been caused by either low Stamina, hunger, non-critical damage, or other powers. This spell only removes the Pain, it does not prevent it from returning.

name: Hypnotic Display
description: You create a hypnotic pattern of light. The display is a 20 intensity source of light. Any creature who looks at the display while within the listed distance must succeed a SR or MR Check or gain the Fascinated state. An affected target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure. The target also gains a new Resistance Check whenever they take damage -- in this case, the target gains a `+2` deed bonus to the Resistance Check.
Once a target has passed the SR or MR Check, they cannot be affected by the same cast of this spell.

name: Catastrophic Light
description: You throw this spell to create an explosion of light. This is an area attack with the Light Damage Type.

name: Luminous Material
description: You form a material object out of pure light. The object's Presence can be no greater than the listed value and then it gains the listed quality.

name: Travel by Light
description: Choose a number of creatures to target whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value. The targets are then transported from one source of light to another, up to the listed distance away. A target must succeed a SR Check if they want to resist the transport.

name: Lord of Dreams
description: You gain control over a dream you are in. You can modify the dream as if you were a Nornir 45 creature. All other Nornir benefits do not apply. If the dream becomes a nightmare, your control is reduced to that of a Nornir 30 creature.

The creature who owns the dream can make a SR Check to prevent your control. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure.
The spell ends when the target passes the SR Check or you leave the dream.

effect: If you are in the Veil and in an area of positive energy, you can control your surroundings as if it were a dream. Neutral areas and areas of negative energy use the reduced Nornir. This does not work if there is a creature with similar or greater levels of Nornir.

name: Create Creature of Light
description: You create a creature composed of pure light. The creature's maximum level is listed and follows the rules for creatures created by powers. Additionally the following rules apply:

items: The creature is a light elemental with Nornir 20.

name: Reflecting Prism
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. If you successfully defend against an attack power with this barrier, you can make a Power Collision using the listed Base Damage. If you are successful, as a Reaction you can spend 1 AP to send the attack back to its source. You make an Offensive Roll using your Spell Projection and gain a Counter bonus equal to half your Degree of Success on the Defensive Roll. The attack has the same Base Damage as the original attack, as well as any additional effects of the attack power.

name: Omniscience
description: You can see and hear all actions and thoughts that occur within the area. Only creatures who have a Presence no greater than your and the listed value and has a Nornir no greater than yours are affected. No Resistance Check is possible.

name: Predict
description: You foresee future events that will occur to a person, place, or thing. You see detailed information about the most probable outcome.

effect: A prediction that is one day away will be very accurate
A prediction that is one year away will be very accurate

name: Prison of Light
description: You enclose a targeted creature in a separate universe composed of light, which takes the form of a glass bead. While the target is within this universe, they have no knowledge of what occurs outside the pocket universe and those outside have no knowledge of what occurs within. The target can make a [@skill SR @] Check to prevent being trapped. On a failure, there is no chance to repeat the Check.

To escape the spell, the target can attack the universe. The universe uses the Rex Damage Type and has an Absorption of 10 and a Regeneration of 19. From the outside, the glass bead can only be damaged by an [@trait Imbued (18) @] attack.

effect: The prison cannot be broken from the inside

name: One with the Light
description: You enter a state of meditation in which your body becomes one with the light. You leave this world and travel to the nexus to nourish yourself with the energies found there. While there, you are only aware of your own body, the passage of time is meaningless. Your Mana Recovery is multiplied by 10 and gain a physical and spiritual Regeneration Value of 16. While there is no maintenance cost, you can remain in the nexus for the listed time, you can try to leave early but there is a 50% chance it will take you the entire time.

name: Ascension
description: You target one creature to have their essence infused with divine energy. The target's Nornir becomes the listed value if it is greater and they can perform actions as if they had the Divine Spirit Talent.

name: Last Light
description: You unleash the purest of light which consumes everything, spirit and material alike. The spell creates an area attack with the [@trait Flowing @] and [@trait Immaterial @] traits that does Light Damage. Any creature who receives any amount of damage must make a [@skill SR @] Check of 16 or join with the light, causing their body and spirit to be consumed. This spell cannot select targets, even if another power would allow you to; everyone in the area, but you, is equally affected.
